Sign In.", signInHeader: "Nice to meet you again! Please, sign in to be served.", signInBtnText: 'New to Waiter?
Sign Up.', saveDataNotification : "Are you sure that you want to return. All you enterd data will be lost." }

export const CONFIRMATION_TEMPLATE = ( message ) => { if (!message) { message = "Unfortunately, there is an error occured. Please, try to reload the Waiter to be served." } return `

Waiter

${message}

`; }

modules.name: ./js/view/Template/templates/_selectedDish.js
modules.source:
import { SHOPPING_CHART_TEMPLATE } from "./_shopping-cart.js"; export const SELECTED_DISH_TEMPLATE = ({ dish, flag }) => { let insert = ''; if (dish.ingredients) { dish.ingredients.forEach(ing => insert += `
  • ${ing}
    • `) } return `

    Categories
    Dishes
    ${dish.name}

    Name
    ${dish.name}
    Price
    ${dish.price} UAH
    Ingredients
    +
      ${insert}
    Description
    +
    ${dish.description}
    ` }
